description: Wave is more than just an audio and phone call recorder—it's your AI-powered ally for capturing life's most important moments. Whether you're at work, in class,…
title: ‎Wave: AI Note Taker on the App Store
keywords: Wave: AI Note Taker, Mohrer Associates LLC, Productivity,Utilities, ios apps, app, appstore, app store, iphone, ipad, ipod touch, itouch, itunes
introduction: Wave is an AI-powered audio and phone call recorder that helps users capture important moments effortlessly. It offers features like non-stop audio recording, phone call recording with automatic transcription, intelligent summaries, unlimited recording time, transcription services, easy organization, and multiple sharing options. Wave is ideal for students, professionals, and anyone who needs to take notes efficiently. The app is developed by Mohrer Associates LLC and is available for iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, and Mac devices.
targetPeople: Students, professionals, individuals who need efficient note-taking

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available for Wave?
faqs.answer: No, Wave is free to download with in-app purchases for additional features.

faqs.question: What devices are compatible with Wave?
faqs.answer: Wave is compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, and Mac devices.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of Wave?
faqs.answer: Wave is developed by Mohrer Associates LLC.
